name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software Engineer II with 13+ years of experience in full stack development, specializing in **React**, **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript**, with robust capabilities in **HTML**, **CSS**, and **C#/.NET**. Expert in building scalable applications leveraging both frontend and backend technologies while promoting best practices in **DevOps**, **CI/CD**, and **infrastructure as code**. Proven track record in utilizing **AWS** and **GCP** for cloud deployment, with experience in **DynamoDB** and **MySQL** for database management.

Demonstrated ability to implement microservices and microfrontend architectures within monorepo structures, enhancing team collaboration and code efficiency. Strong problem-solving skills complemented by effective communication and collaboration within dynamic teams. Committed to delivering high-performance solutions across diverse sectors, including healthcare and finance, while maintaining compliance with industry standards.
